channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024020639
item.description:
Report X-2024020639

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: ROSWELL
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During unload PHs found the hazmat at the bottom of the trailer with the orientation arrows not followed. A manager was called over and damaged hazmat was removed and put in out hazardous work area. DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Put in a plastic tub

item.title: Report E-2024020352
item.description:
Report E-2024020352

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-14
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: GROENDYKE TRANSPORT INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver loaded EUP in compartment #1 because the store layout is such that it can be dropped in this manner without moving the truck. Driver stuck the tanks but failed to check the Veeder Root. Driver failed to properly complete the math resulting in the overfill. Driver was connected to both E10 tanks at the time of unloading but was only unloading into one at a time.

item.title: Report X-2024020602
item.description:
Report X-2024020602

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: while unloading trailer package was leaking and was brought to qa. DescribePack: the bottom of the package was wet from the contents leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was brought to qa and put into a bin to keep it from leaking
